attributes.review:
I downloaded this app so I could support our mr orange president but after a while I was just looking for some updates about our dearest mr pres when I suddenly stumbled upon a pee pee pick of the one and only mr trump . I was very shocked , confused , and very disturbed. It was not a very pleasing photo. I am now traumatized by the weird view of the photo . Every time I blink I remember . Havenâ€™t been able to sleep for days because every time I close my eyes itâ€™s just there . After a week I became very paranoid with the lack of sleep Iâ€™ve been getting and suddenly started hearing weird things all over my house . The one night I was able to finally fall asleep next to my cutie pie little doggy tea chihuahua âœ¨ğŸ¦‹daisyğŸ¦‹âœ¨ I had woken up in the middle of the night . Suddenly I got a pain in my back . It wasnâ€™t like any pain I felt before , it felt like I had been stavbrf by thousands of needles all over my body , but where most of the pain was coming from was the behind of my body . I stood up went in front of the mirror to see if there was any marks on my body . There , there I was with bruises coveryung my entire body and cuts all over my legs and arms . The thing that stood out the most was the giant writing on my back . You would not believe what it said , it said â€œtrump 2020â€  . In my head I thought â€œ why is this happening, what is this , trump 2020?!?! , is this happening because of that one photo I viewed that day ??!?!.â€ I let out a tremendous scream as I stood in the front of my room . In the wall was carved â€œ trump 2020â€ very 
Vividly and very clear . Since I lived in a remote place I had no one to call out to. My only instinct was to run out . I ran and ran . I got on a bus that led me to the city to where my family lives . One I got to my familyâ€™s house I told no one what had happened afraid that what happened back there would come after me . To this day I had told no one about this :///
